trans-unit.source: title: App provisioning profiles | Microsoft Intune description: Intune gives you the tools to proactively deploy a new provisioning profile policy to devices that have apps that are nearing expiry.
trans-unit.target: title: App provisioning profiles | Microsoft Intune description: Intune gives you the tools to proactively deploy a new provisioning profile policy to devices that have apps that are nearing expiry.

trans-unit.target: ms.custom:

trans-unit.source: Use iOS mobile provisioning profile policies to prevent your apps from expiring
trans-unit.target: Use iOS mobile provisioning profile policies to prevent your apps from expiring

trans-unit.source: Apple iOS line of business apps that are deployed to iPhones and iPads are built with an included provisioning profile and code that is signed with a certificate.
trans-unit.target: Apple iOS line of business apps that are deployed to iPhones and iPads are built with an included provisioning profile and code that is signed with a certificate.

trans-unit.source: When the app is run, iOS confirms the integrity of the iOS app and enforces policies that are defined by the provisioning profile.
trans-unit.target: When the app is run, iOS confirms the integrity of the iOS app and enforces policies that are defined by the provisioning profile.

trans-unit.source: The following validations happen:
trans-unit.target: The following validations happen:

trans-unit.source: **Installation file integrity** - iOS compares the app's details with the enterprise signing certificate's public key.
trans-unit.target: **Installation file integrity** - iOS compares the app's details with the enterprise signing certificate's public key.

trans-unit.source: If they differ, the app's content might have changed, and the app will not be allowed to run.
trans-unit.target: If they differ, the app's content might have changed, and the app will not be allowed to run.

trans-unit.source: **Capabilities enforcement** - iOS attempts to enforce the app's capabilities from the enterprise provisioning profile (not individual developer provisioning profiles) that are in the app installation (.ipa) file.
trans-unit.target: **Capabilities enforcement** - iOS attempts to enforce the app's capabilities from the enterprise provisioning profile (not individual developer provisioning profiles) that are in the app installation (.ipa) file.

trans-unit.source: The enterprise signing certificate that you use to sign apps typically lasts for three years.
trans-unit.target: The enterprise signing certificate that you use to sign apps typically lasts for three years.

trans-unit.source: However, the provisioning profile expires after a year.
trans-unit.target: However, the provisioning profile expires after a year.

trans-unit.source: While the certificate is still valid, Intune gives you the tools to proactively deploy a new provisioning profile policy to devices that have apps that are nearing expiry.
trans-unit.target: While the certificate is still valid, Intune gives you the tools to proactively deploy a new provisioning profile policy to devices that have apps that are nearing expiry.

trans-unit.source: After the certificate expires, you must sign the app again with a new certificate and embed a new provisioning profile with the key of the new certificate.
trans-unit.target: After the certificate expires, you must sign the app again with a new certificate and embed a new provisioning profile with the key of the new certificate.

trans-unit.source: How to find out when a line of business app will expire
trans-unit.target: How to find out when a line of business app will expire

trans-unit.source: In the [Microsoft Intune administration console](https://manage.microsoft.com), choose **Apps** > **Apps**.
trans-unit.target: In the [Microsoft Intune administration console](https://manage.microsoft.com), choose **Apps** > **Apps**.

trans-unit.source: In the list of apps, look at the **Expiration date** column to see the expiry date for the app.
trans-unit.target: In the list of apps, look at the **Expiration date** column to see the expiry date for the app.

trans-unit.source: You can also set the **Filters** drop-down list to **Expired/about to expire** to see only the apps for which you must take action.
trans-unit.target: You can also set the **Filters** drop-down list to **Expired/about to expire** to see only the apps for which you must take action.

trans-unit.source: How to create an iOS mobile provisioning profile policy
trans-unit.target: How to create an iOS mobile provisioning profile policy

trans-unit.source: In the [Microsoft Intune administration console](https://manage.microsoft.com), choose **Policy** > **Overview** > **Add Policy**.
trans-unit.target: In the [Microsoft Intune administration console](https://manage.microsoft.com), choose **Policy** > **Overview** > **Add Policy**.

trans-unit.source: In the **Create a New Policy** dialog box, choose **iOS** > **Mobile Provisioning Profile Policy**, and then choose **Create Policy**.
trans-unit.target: In the **Create a New Policy** dialog box, choose **iOS** > **Mobile Provisioning Profile Policy**, and then choose **Create Policy**.

trans-unit.source: On the **General** page, configure the following values:
trans-unit.target: On the **General** page, configure the following values:

trans-unit.source: **Name** - Provide a name for this mobile provisioning profile policy.
trans-unit.target: **Name** - Provide a name for this mobile provisioning profile policy.

trans-unit.source: **Description** - Optionally, provide a description for the policy.
trans-unit.target: **Description** - Optionally, provide a description for the policy.

trans-unit.source: **Configuration profile file** - Click **Import**, and then choose an Apple Mobile Configuration Profile file (with the extension **.mobileprovision**) that you downloaded from the Apple Developer website.
trans-unit.target: **Configuration profile file** - Click **Import**, and then choose an Apple Mobile Configuration Profile file (with the extension **.mobileprovision**) that you downloaded from the Apple Developer website.

trans-unit.source: When you are done, choose **Save Policy**.
trans-unit.target: When you are done, choose **Save Policy**.

trans-unit.source: Now, deploy the policy to the required iOS devices.
trans-unit.target: Now, deploy the policy to the required iOS devices.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Manage settings and features on your devices with Microsoft Intune policies](manage-settings-and-features-on-your-devices-with-microsoft-intune-policies).
trans-unit.target: For more information, see [Manage settings and features on your devices with Microsoft Intune policies](manage-settings-and-features-on-your-devices-with-microsoft-intune-policies).
